item.title: Venue
item.description: About Our Center As part of the GENIUS@pintar education programme, the school provides gifted Malaysian students with a focused and holistic learning environment. It is no surprise that The PERMATApintar （now known as GENIUS@pintar) Auditorium and Sports Park, designed by GDP architects, have won multiple awards such as 2015 PAM Awards, the premier award for architecture in Malaysia. The park includes an auditorium, running track, football field, Olympic-sized swimming pool and spectator facilities.

item.title: About Us
item.description: What is MUN? The Model United Nations, usually known as MUN, is a simulation of actual United Nations conferences. Participants are known as delegates, and are each assigned a country to represent as well as a council or committee to participate in. Throughout the conference period, delegates will have to discuss a given topic and reach a resolution with the rest of their council members by the end. About GMUN GENIUS Model United Nations 2023 (GMUN 2023) is a Model United Nations Conference held by our school, Kolej GENIUS@Pintar Negara and ASASIpintar UKM.

item.title: Councils
item.description: Note: The topics for GMUN 2023 have not been announced yet. Once updated, all topics, chairs and countries will be available on this page. GMUN 2023 will be using HMUN Rules of Procedure. Please check out the materials page for more details. Beginner Councils UNEP United Nations Environment Programme WHO World Health Organization DISEC Disarmament and International Security Committee UNWOMEN United Nations Women Intermediate Councils ECOSOC Economic and Social Council UNDP United Nations Development Programme ASEAN Association of Southeast Asian Nations Advanced Councils Crisis Crisis Council WTO World Trade Organization Special Council Press Press Corps

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you have any questions or inquiries, please do not hesitate to reach out to us directly at genmodelun@gmail.com. We look forward to hearing from you! Alternatively, you can message us at one of our social media linked at the bottom of the page. Our team works around the clock to make sure that you receive your reply as soon as possible. Need to mail us something? You can do so here:

item.title: Registration
item.description: Registration for GMUN 2023 has not yet opened GROUP REGISTRATION Eligibility GMUN 2023 is open to students who are: Of any nationality or citizenship Of any gender, race, or ethnicity Currently enrolled in any educational institution of any level Registration Instructions Step 1: Fill in the Registration Form Students interested in applying to the conference may apply through a school or as an individual delegate. As such, applicants may apply through two different channels:
